metadata.title: USN-4746-1 -- xterm vulnerability
metadata.description: Tavis Ormandy discovered that xterm incorrectly handled certain character sequences. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause xterm to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4746-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  xterm - 322-1ubuntu1.2 No subscription required
